text: Raju Daniel (27 June 1950 â€“ 17 September 2018), known by his stage name Captain Raju, was an Indian army officer and actor. He was born in Omallur, Kerala. He acted in more than 500 movies. He was best known for his performances in character roles, and as a villain. His best known roles were in Nalla Naal, Rowdy Alludu, and in Cotton Mary. Raju died of complications from a stroke on 17 September 2018 in Kochi, Kerala at the age of 68.Malayalam Actor Captain Raju Passes Away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian military people Category:Actors from Kerala Category:Indian Christians
title: Captain Raju
